mapper.insert: insert into account ( id, username, nickname, salt, password, avatar, gender, cellphone, email, birth, describe, region, country, regtime, registerip ) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{salt}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{cellphone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{describe}, #{region}, #{country}, #{regtime}, #{registerip})

insert into account ( id, username, nickname, salt, password, avatar, gender, cellphone, email, birth, describe, region, country, regtime, registerip ) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{salt}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{cellphone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{describe}, #{region}, #{country}, #{regtime}, #{registerip})
